short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A persistent mute tool for stupid websites that make annoying and ill-timed sounds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A persistent mute tool for stupid websites that make annoying and ill-timed sounds. Stops auto-playing video sound, etc., and sites will stay muted until you un-mute them (even if closed and revisited). Apparently a similar feature is upcoming in Chrome 64, but you can use this extension in the meantime.
